name: Microsoft Teams
author: Your IT Department
description: Someone is typing... Can everyone see my screen? You're on mute. The enterprise collaboration experience you never asked for.

messages: You're on mute.
Can everyone see my screen?
Someone is typing...
Sorry, I was on mute.
Let me share my screen... one moment...
Can you hear me now?
I think we lost David.
Your camera is off. Is everything okay?
Shall we take this offline?
Let's circle back on this code.
I'll ping you on Teams.
Let's sync up after this meeting.
That's a great question. Can you repeat it?
I think there's a lag on my end.
Has anyone tried restarting their router?
This could have been an email.
Let me add you to this thread.
Action item: Review this pull request.
I'll follow up with a Teams message.
Does anyone have any blockers?
Let's put a pin in that.
We're running out of time, but quick thought...
Sorry, my Internet dropped. What did I miss?
Can you see my cursor?
I think you're still sharing your screen.
Let's do a quick standup on this bug.
Who owns this code? Let me @ them.
Please update the status in the channel.
